room_title: Escape room "Pirate Plank Escape" by The Mansion Escape Room in Tallahassee
room_description: Can you help Seamus the Scatterbrain to find Captain Finn's treasure map and escape the Plank? You see he's hid the map but keeps forgetting where he put it.  Thankfully, he left puzzles and clues to help him find it again. Help Seamus find the map by solving all the puzzles and escape before the captain returns or you'll be walking the plank with him.
